Hi,

When I try to run tutorial 13 or any program at that, the camera displays the video with the AR in a new window on the screen. Is there a way to have that window remain while also having the video streamed to the goggles display? The only solution I've found is to clone the screen so I can visualize it on both. But I don't care to see my computer screen on the goggles. I want to only see the camera view on my goggles and a camera view in its own window on my computer.

I'd appreciate any help you can give me.

Thanks,

Natalie

Hmm... I don't know how to do that, but you will have to play with your graphics card setting to do such configuration.

I always clone the display and run the program in full-screen mode when I use the goggles.
